feed.title: SAP Community - SAP S/4HANA Cloud Extensibility
feed.subtitle: SAP S/4HANA Cloud Extensibility Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: MM_PUR_S4_PO_MODIFY_HEADER not triggered during Automatic Creation of PO from PR.
entry.content:
Currently I_PURCHASEORDEREMAILPARAMETER is not extensible so MM_PUR_S4_PO_MODIFY_HEADER is used to update custom fields in PO email template. This is working fine during creation/update of PO however MM_PUR_S4_PO_MODIFY_HEADER is not triggered during Automatic Creation of PO from PR.

How can you update custom fields for PO email template during automatic PO creation from PR? 

PUR_S4_PO_MODIFY_ITEM and MM_PUR_S4_PO_MODIFY_ITEM were checked however custom field cannot be used for email template.

entry.title: I_JournalEntryItem”无法在Customer Data Browser”里显示问题-如何在公有云中能看到Journal Entry Line Item的data？
entry.content:
I_JournalEntryItem”无法在Customer Data Browser”里显示问题-如何在公有云中能看到Journal Entry Line Item的data？

When checking app Customer Data Browser, we want to display all finance data (ACDOCA) in cds views. According to hub https://api.sap.com/cdsviews/I_JOURNALENTRYITEM, the cds view should be I_JournalEntryItem (Basic).

However, in app “Customer Data Browser”, we cannot find this cds views

How can we see the journal entry item cds view directly in cloud system? (same as checking ACDOCA in OP)

We also tried to go to “Custom CDS Views”, and created a  YY1_JEItem cds view with the “I_JournalEntryItem” as primary data source. But we can only pick the fields one by one. This is not what we want. We want to directly check the journal entry line item data in public cloud, just like we can check the data of the header system.

 

Besides, we also found the cds view: I_ACCOUNTINGDOCUMENTJOURNAL. But we see that the amount of fields are not the same. Not sure if we can use this one though.

entry.title: Need Help Mapping Tax Entries to Supplier Invoice Items–Issue in Developing Purchase Register Report
entry.content:
Dear SAP Community,

We are in the process of developing a custom Purchase Register report in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud, and are encountering several challenges in retrieving accurate tax information at the invoice item level. Despite leveraging standard CDS views, we are unable to establish a reliable linkage between tax entries and their corresponding document items—which is critical for our reporting requirements.

Purpose of the Requirement
The goal is to build a Purchase Register report that provides a consolidated view of:

  • Supplier invoice line items

  • Tax amounts (eligible and ineligible)

  • Freight and asset item taxes

  • Proper item-wise tax segregation and traceability

This report is essential for GST compliance, input tax credit (ITC) auditability, and monthly financial reporting. However, the current limitations in CDS views are hindering this development.

Key Issues Faced

Case 1: Ineligible Tax – Missing Item-Level Field

  • No dedicated item-level field exists for capturing ineligible tax amounts.

  • The available tax CDS views do not return these tax entries, making it difficult to retrieve or calculate the correct tax per invoice item.

Case 2: Freight as a Separate Line Item

  • When freight is posted separately, the tax CDS views do not clearly map the freight tax to the original invoice item.

  • Since both the invoice and freight line may share the same item number, it's impossible to distinguish the tax details per line.

Case 4 & 5: Asset Item – Tax Posting Per Quantity

  • For asset purchases, tax is posted per quantity (e.g., 3 units = 3 tax lines).

  • This leads to a mismatch between item numbers of the invoice and the tax entries.

  • As a result, we cannot reliably link each tax entry to the correct item in the billing document, breaking traceability and affecting report accuracy.

CDS Views Evaluated

We have tried the following:

  • I_OperationalAcctgDocItem
    Used to retrieve item-level data for supplier invoices, but lacks direct tax linkage.

  • I_SupplierInvoiceTaxAPI01
    Evaluated, but it does not provide the expected item-level breakdown or association to the correct invoice lines.

Help Needed From Community

We are looking for your expert suggestions on:

  • Any alternate CDS views that offer more granular linkage between invoice item and tax lines.

  • Recommended approaches or best practices to model or join tax data effectively for such scenarios.

  • Relevant SAP Notes, documentation, or workarounds followed in Public Cloud environments.

Any support, guidance, or shared experiences would be greatly appreciated to help us unblock this critical development.

Thank you in advance!

Kind regards,
Tasneem Ahmad Karimi

Let me know if you'd like a version with your company name, SAP tenant ID, or further formatting.

entry.title: Mass creation of Business Roles and assignment to Business Users in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition
entry.content:
Hi team,

In SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2402, we were able to create roles in mass and had option to assign roles to users using file upload.

Could you please tell us if this can be done in 2502 also? Please provide any documentation of mass role creation (template to create roles and assign the restrictions) and template to assign roles to users.


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: Possibility for Mass Production Order Confirmation in Foreground from template in SAP Public Cloud?
entry.content:
Hi,

We have a requirement, where users perform "Mass Confirmation of production order's" through Excel template. Also, the confirmation screen - CO11N have certain validations (using Badi) in place for the order to be confirmed.

Each order is confirmed in foreground, allowing users to manipulate "Goods movement data - yield Qty, posting date, Storage location, Execution date, Component Qty" to be within validations placed. This is possible in ECC.

Requirement in Public cloud system:

1) User should be able to upload list of Production orders with other info through Template.

2) User should perform confirmation in the foreground with data picked from template and also allowing to change on screen confirmation data.

Has anyone achieved or any possible leads for the same to be replicated in SAP Public Cloud environment?

Thankyou.

entry.title: SAP S/4 HANA Cloud Public Edition - F0798 "Create Billing Documents" app - Billing Settings
entry.content:
Hi,

Do we have any role settings that would restrict the User to modify the SAP S/4 HANA Cloud Public Edition - F0798 "Create Billing Documents" app - Billing Settings.

Currently the Users can modify the Billing Settings.

entry.title: BADI Recommendation for Vendor Balance Validation in FB65 in public cloud
entry.content:
Dear Team,

We have a business requirement where users should be allowed to post an FB65 transaction (Create Incoming Invoice) only if the vendor has a NIL or debit balance (that is, the vendor balance must be greater than or equal to zero).

Could you please advise which BADI can be used to implement this validation

Thanks & Regards

Dedipya

entry.title: Request for Guidance on Regenerating Payment Advice in SAP Public Cloud
entry.content:
Dear team,

In the SAP Public Cloud, the payment advice is generated during the automatic payment run (F110). However, as business users update the UTR number and reference details in subsequent steps, these fields are not available at the time of payment advice generation.

Could you please advise on a possible approach or workaround to regenerate the payment advice in SAP Public Cloud to reflect the updated UTR and reference information.

Thanks & Regards

Dedipya

entry.title: BADi MRM_CHECK_INVOICE_CLOUD - can't find Transaction attribute
entry.content:
Dear experts, I have to make sure that supplier invoice, debit and credit memo is posted with a specific FI Document type.

For this I expected to cross check invoice's Transaction ("Invoice" | "Credit memo" | "Subsequent debit" | "Subsequent credit") against FI Document type. In the BADi I cannot find attribute Transaction - please advise.

Kindest regards,

Victor

@Zhehui_Xia28

Product and Topic Expert

entry.title: Adaptation Project for Post Outgoing Payment (F1612)
entry.content:
Hi SAP Community,

I'm working on an adaptation project for the "Post Outgoing Payments" (F1612) Fiori app. The adaptation project works fine in Preview and in the Adaptation Editor, but after deployment, launching the app shows a blank page.

Here’s the error shown in the browser console:
Uncaught (in promise) Unknown consumer of clearing library: <my namespace>
I haven’t made any modifications—just created the adaptation project and deployed it as-is. I expected it to load like the default app, but instead, I’m getting this blank screen.

For context, I'm using VS Code and have tried both the @SAP-ux/generator-adp and @SAP/generator-adaptation-project to generate the project. The result is the same in both cases.

Has anyone experienced something similar? Is there a workaround or specific configuration required to enable adaptation for this app?

Thanks in advance for your help!

entry.content:

Best regards,

Gopal Sahu

entry.title: Plan & Budget import financial data in Public cloud
entry.content:
Dear All,

I would like to import the WBS plan and budget into the system on an annual basis. Plan Category Type: PLN and BUDGET01
If data for the previous year has already been imported, and I would like to import only the Plan and Budget for the current year, after importing only the current year data, the Plan and Budget entries for the previous year disappear. How can we prevent the data from the previous year from disappearing?

Best regards,

Keratiya D.

entry.title: Upload of supplement and transfer budget in Public Cloud
entry.content:
Dear all,

I would like to enter additional budgets with monthly budget control. Currently, in the Supplement Budget entry screen, the system allows creating a budget for only one month per entry. Is there a screen or functionality that allows inputting budgets for multiple posting dates simultaneously?

Regards,

Keratiya D.

entry.title: BADI to pick user name from the user ID in COUNT_LIST output form
entry.content:
Hi,

We have a requirement to display the username in the PI count output format rather than the username which is given in the standard form. We have created a custom field, assigned it to the custom layout and tried using the BADI- INV10_LIST_OF_STOCKS_FORM_I. However, we are unable to get the username.

Please advise.

Thanks,

Ruwani

entry.title: Error in calling Outbound Delivery public API in iflow in integration suite
entry.content:
I have created a simple iflow where odata public API API_OUTBOUND_DELIVERY_SRV;v=0002 is called in odata v2 receiver adapter to fetch Outbound delivery details from SAP S4 HANA public cloud system. I am able to get Outbound Delivery number using GET call. Now, to fetch item details, in resource path, i selected sub level as 1 and then selected item number field in 'to_DeliveryDocumentItem' sub-level.
Below is the query that is getting generated
$select=DeliveryDocument,to_DeliveryDocumentItem/DeliveryDocument,to_DeliveryDocumentItem/DeliveryDocumentItem&$expand=to_DeliveryDocumentItem&$filter=DeliveryDocument eq '80000000'

No payload is passed to this iflow.

I am getting below error when iflow is triggered through postman
com.sap.it.rt.adapter.http.api.exception.HttpResponseException: An internal server error occured: An exception of type 'WstxUnexpectedCharException' occurred.. cause:com.ctc.wstx.exc.WstxUnexpectedCharException: Unexpected character '&' (code 38) (expected a name start character) at [row, col{unknown source}]: [1,182].  The MPL ID for the failed message is : AGiSChZ7DkZ-t0vCX2lUJ7YK8I9d

Kindly help in resolving this issue

Best Regards,

Grace

entry.title: Extending the functionality of eDocument for a non-localized country CE2508
entry.content:
To extend the functionality of eDocument for a non-localized country, ABAP-level extensions and configurations in SAP Cloud Public have been implemented. However, despite following the step-by-step instructions provided in the SAP Learning course Applying Localization as a Self-Service for SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, the Financial Document is not visible in the eDocument Cockpit

An error occurs in the class CL_EDOCUMENT_EXT~CONSTRUCTOR.

 IF lv_abap_langu_version = if_abap_language_version=>gc_version-sap_cloud_platform. "eDocument Country/Region class

 CREATE OBJECT mo_edocument_ext_country TYPE (lv_class_name).

TRY.  "CE2508

lo_edocument_ext_es ?= mo_edocument_ext_country. "CE2508

Where the variable lv_class_name = zcl_drc_edocument, and this class has already been implemented.

 What could be missing?
